name: UISpringLoadedInteractionContext
desc: The interface an object implements to provide information about a spring-loaded interaction.

items.name: var state: UISpringLoadedInteractionEffectState
items.desc: The current view style for the spring-loaded interaction.

items.name: var targetItem: Any?
items.desc: The specific subview, or associated model object, of the target view to use for the spring-loaded interaction.

items.name: var targetView: UIView?
items.desc: The view to which the current spring-loaded interaction view style is applied.

items.name: enum UISpringLoadedInteractionEffectState
items.desc: The spring-loaded interaction states that determine the style of the interaction view.

items.name: func location(in: UIView?) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the location of the drag activity within the specified view.
